Text: There's some choppiness after the opening credits. I stopped watching after that. It may be watchable to some, but it's not my preference. Thanks for the upload VTV, usually your work is excellent, you haven't lost my trust yet :P
There are a lot of reports of this episode being choppy. Even on the XviD versions which leaves me wondering if the XviD versions were taken from this mp4. Hmmmmmm
